social.text:
Your #Golang CLI loads the entire database client just to print a version number.

I spent months refining a pattern to fix this: two-phase initialization.
Command metadata at startup, deps only on execution.

Fast startup, clean tests.
Full pattern breakdown: https://lucaguidi.c
